Sky Knight snickered at Blazer and kept watching Beserk. The clone 
grabbed the sword blade one of the drone's had and threw it with it 
still attached into the other.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Blazer::
> 
> Spark's fly from the first droid's chest as Berserk's claws hit it, 
the drone 
> firing his weapon. He misses, nearly hitting the second droid.
> 
> The first one takes a few steps back, slashing his sword at 
Berserk. The 
> second one walks forward, firing his gun at the bot.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Blazer frowns as he sees the droids firing at Berserk. "Maybe I 
shouldn't 
> have given them guns," he says to Sky Knight.
